Package index

All functions

comex()
Read and Standardize Comexstat Data
comex_check()
Check Consistency Between Comex Data and Conference Files
comex_deflate()
Deflate and Convert Comexstat Data
comex_download()
Download Comexstat Data from MDIC (Brazilian Ministry of Development, Industry, Commerce, and Services)
comex_hs4()
Open ComexStat HS4 Trade Dataset
comex_ncm()
Open ComexStat NCM Trade Dataset
comex_roll()
Calculate Rolling Sums for Comex Data
comex_sum()
Aggregate Comex Data by Summing Columns with Matching Prefixes
get_deflators()
Download and processes deflators (CPI/USA, IPCA/Brazil, Exchange rate BRL/USD)
ncm()
Standardize and Validate NCM Codes
ncms()
Merge and Format NCM Datasets from Comexstat
